tweet.html: RT @SHFGHistorians: Today is the day! Annual meeting begins @USNatArchives at 9am w the Federal Jobs Workshop- followed by some excellent panels on why Federal History Matters, oral History workshop, and more! shfg.wildapricot.org/admin/website follow us at #SHFG2019 #twitterstorians #FederalHistory
